text: @sanketnagrale ...yes 3 registers would be required...assign 1 in place of leaf node having 1...But ..I think this is correct tree according to Sethi-Ullman algo for given question ....We have to assign 1 to variables and zero if constants... @Amit Puri You have assigned zero to Â¢ variable which is wrong i think.......correct me if wrong.. 1. For every non-constant leaf node, assign a 1 (i.e. 1 register is needed to hold the variable/field/etc.).
